LABEL: 0x2D6
STRING: 「Owowow...」

LABEL: 0x359
STRING: The elevator.

LABEL: 0x375
STRING: I was ejected from inside it along with a large amount of water and ended up hitting my back into the wall.

LABEL: 0x3B7
STRING: Thanks to my dizzyingly spinning vision and gravity, I was lying on the floor of the lobby of the rear section.

LABEL: 0x40B
STRING: This was the second time I'd felt this sensation... The last time was when I had saved Reiri.

LABEL: 0x44D
STRING: I still couldn't get used to this pain...

LABEL: 0x48C
STRING: 『Are you alright, Katagiri-san?』

LABEL: 0x4BB
STRING: I heard a worried voice coming from my ear.

LABEL: 0x4E7
STRING: 「Just like last time, I'm not okay...」

LABEL: 0x524
STRING: 『I see. That's good, then.』

LABEL: 0x557
STRING: It wasn't good.

LABEL: 0x573
STRING: I guess it'd be rude to retort like that.

LABEL: 0x5A5
STRING: I stood up, still soaked in water and wearing my even heavier diving suit.

LABEL: 0x5EB
STRING: It was just like back then...

LABEL: 0x611
STRING: What was different was that I had already achieved my goal.

LABEL: 0x64D
STRING: I turned my back to the warehouse of the rear section and headed through the bridge.

LABEL: 0x705
STRING: But still, it was heavy.

LABEL: 0x729
STRING: Considering you were going wear this thing in a normal atmosphere, you'd think they'd build it with that in mind as well...

LABEL: 0x7A1
STRING: I passed through the long bridge and eventually arrived at the lobby in the front section.

LABEL: 0x887
STRING: 「Phew...」

LABEL: 0x8A1
STRING: Finally, I took off the diving suit and breathed in the outside air.

LABEL: 0x8D9
STRING: This was my third deep-sea expedition with a diving suit,

LABEL: 0x928
STRING: and while I had gotten accustomed to moving around with it on, it still didn't feel comfortable at all.

LABEL: 0x964
STRING: Well, not that I wanted to get used to it anymore...

LABEL: 0xA3A
STRING: Looking at my feet, the outflowing seawater was surging into the front section, like waves crashing on a shore.

LABEL: 0xA9E
STRING: The sight of it gave me chills.

LABEL: 0xACA
STRING: What was terrifying was the possibility that something had slipped in with the seawater again.

LABEL: 0xB10
STRING: If that luminescent organism had really slipped into the ship during Reiri's rescue operation, then――

LABEL: 0xBC0
STRING: I ran over to the bridge, pressed the button, and closed the doors.

LABEL: 0xC63
STRING: The space was now sealed by a watertight door.

LABEL: 0xC89
STRING: It'd probably never be opened again.

LABEL: 0xCBD
STRING: And, that was fine.

LABEL: 0xD7D
STRING: Just then, two sets of footsteps came running from above.

LABEL: 0xDB6
STRING: It was Yukari and Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0xDD0
STRING: The two of them smiled from ear to ear as soon as they saw me.

LABEL: 0xEDD
STRING: 「It's a success!」

LABEL: 0xEFB
STRING: 「Now, we can go to the surface!!」

LABEL: 0xF2E
STRING: 「...Yeah, you're right.」

LABEL: 0xF52
STRING: My reply was unenthusiastic.

LABEL: 0xF76
STRING: And sure enough, Yukari looked at me as if something was strange.

LABEL: 0x1026
STRING: 「What's wrong? You look depressed.」

LABEL: 0x1061
STRING: 「Nothing...」

LABEL: 0x107B
STRING: 「I'm just feeling sentimental.」

LABEL: 0x10A7
STRING: 「Thinking about how we're about to leave this ship after spending the last few days here...」

LABEL: 0x1102
STRING: I hastily tried to smooth things over.

LABEL: 0x1120
STRING: What came out of my mouth were random excuses... made-up words.

LABEL: 0x115E
STRING: But, in a way, it was the truth.

LABEL: 0x118E
STRING: It might be imprudent of me, but if all of this had not happened, I wouldn't be here now.

LABEL: 0x11EC
STRING: It was because of these encounters inside the <SHEEP III> that I was here at this moment.

LABEL: 0x12A9
STRING: 「What's with you...?」

LABEL: 0x12C7
STRING: 「What do you think we've been working so hard for all this time?」

LABEL: 0x134C
STRING: Yukari smiled in exasperation at my words.

LABEL: 0x137C
STRING: However, she must have felt conflicted as well since she seemed to believe everything that came out of my mouth without any doubt.

LABEL: 0x13E2
STRING: Condensed time.

LABEL: 0x13FC
STRING: At times we clashed with each other, and at times we hurt each other.

LABEL: 0x1438
STRING: However, they'd been mutual exchanges of thoughts.

LABEL: 0x14E2
STRING: 「...Now's not the time to get emotional.」

LABEL: 0x1522
STRING: 「Both of you, get your diving suits on!」

LABEL: 0x1551
STRING: 「Yeah, about that...」

LABEL: 0x15E9
STRING: 「Yes?」

LABEL: 0x1606
STRING: I interrupted the hurrying Yukari.

LABEL: 0x1624
STRING: She looked at me in surprise.

LABEL: 0x1654
STRING: 「Yukari-san... Can we talk for a moment before that?」

LABEL: 0x1704
STRING: 「Talk...?」

LABEL: 0x1729
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x173F
STRING: 「...About what happened seven years ago.」

LABEL: 0x1769
STRING: Seven years ago. That word had great meaning, and her expression turned serious in an instant.

LABEL: 0x1829
STRING: 「Do we need to right now?」

LABEL: 0x185F
STRING: 「Can't that――」

LABEL: 0x1882
STRING: 「No.」

LABEL: 0x1898
STRING: 「I want to talk to you right now.」

LABEL: 0x18B8
STRING: Yukari asked me in a whispering voice.

LABEL: 0x18DA
STRING: Seeing her so serious, I responded the same way.

LABEL: 0x1930
STRING: I turned around to see Tokiwa bumping the helmet of her diving suit against her forehead.

LABEL: 0x19EF
STRING: 「Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x1A16
STRING: 「Yes, this is Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x1A3D
STRING: 「...Would you mind waiting in the laboratory for a moment?」

LABEL: 0x1A80
STRING: 「Why?」

LABEL: 0x1AA3
STRING: Tokiwa continued bumping her head against the headpiece in a steady and joyful manner.

LABEL: 0x1AF7
STRING: ...Was it really that fun?

LABEL: 0x1B2B
STRING: It looked to me like it'd just hurt...

LABEL: 0x1B6C
STRING: 「It's unfair to keep things a secret from me, don't you think?」

LABEL: 0x1BC1
STRING: 「It's a private matter.」

LABEL: 0x1BE9
STRING: 「We'll be done soon, so please.」

LABEL: 0x1C9C
STRING: Tokiwa put her helmet on the floor and pondered.

LABEL: 0x1CD0
STRING: She had just been told to go to the lab. What was she thinking about, I wondered.

LABEL: 0x1D22
STRING: After a long silence, she raised her head.

LABEL: 0x1DBE
STRING: 「...I understand.」

LABEL: 0x1DE0
STRING: 「I can read the mood.」

LABEL: 0x1E0F
STRING: 「...Great.」

LABEL: 0x1E2B
STRING: Hearing that coming from the winner of Miss I-can't-read-the-mood was rich.

LABEL: 0x1E7F
STRING: I wasn't sure if she was even capable of it at all.

LABEL: 0x1EC3
STRING: Tokiwa disappeared down the hallway while carrying her diving suit helmet.

LABEL: 0x1F11
STRING: 「Now then――」

LABEL: 0x1F99
STRING: 「So, what did you want to talk about?」

LABEL: 0x1FC8
STRING: 「...Let's go somewhere else first.」

LABEL: 0x2168
STRING: After talking with Yukari inside one of the crew rooms, we headed to the laboratory where Tokiwa was waiting for us.

LABEL: 0x222A
STRING: 「Oh, that was fast.」

LABEL: 0x2253
STRING: As for Tokiwa, she was sitting on the floor while rolling her helmet in her hands.

LABEL: 0x22B7
STRING: The level of playing she exhibited was like that of a pre-schooler, but...

LABEL: 0x22E7
STRING: 「Sorry for the wait.」

LABEL: 0x2379
STRING: 「It was nothing. It didn't feel long at all.」

LABEL: 0x23BC
STRING: 「Well then, let's get out of here.」

LABEL: 0x244C
STRING: 「Yes, boss.」

LABEL: 0x248A
STRING: No one reacted, not anymore.

LABEL: 0x24B8
STRING: For a while now, Tokiwa had been acting abnormally, and I couldn't really tell why.

LABEL: 0x24FE
STRING: What was it that suddenly made her say something unusual?

LABEL: 0x2538
STRING: Just moments ago, she was using all of her brain power to think of a way to escape. What was the meaning of this sudden change?

LABEL: 0x25C0
STRING: Was she nervous in her own way, or was she reading the mood?

LABEL: 0x2604
STRING: In any case, it seemed like even Tokiwa couldn't act as she usually did in the face of our escape.

LABEL: 0x2735
STRING: 「Let's talk about the specifics of how we're getting out of here.」

LABEL: 0x2773
STRING: 「I spoke with Katagiri-san, but...」

LABEL: 0x27A7
STRING: 「I want you and him to go to the surface.」

LABEL: 0x2861
STRING: 「That won't do.」

LABEL: 0x2880
STRING: Tokiwa refuted her with a straight face.

LABEL: 0x2910
STRING: 「It has to be all of us.」

LABEL: 0x2949
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san, please don't jump to conclusions.」

LABEL: 0x297F
STRING: 「I'll be rescued later.」

LABEL: 0x29AD
STRING: 「And not just me, Hiragino-sensei and Reiri-san too...」

LABEL: 0x29F4
STRING: Hiragino and Reiri...

LABEL: 0x2A10
STRING: Yukari should have seen them.

LABEL: 0x2A32
STRING: Those masses of light lying in the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x2A6C
STRING: Lumps about the size of a person's body.

LABEL: 0x2AB0
STRING: Saying that they would be rescued after seeing that――

LABEL: 0x2AFB
STRING: 「Everyone will be rescued...」

LABEL: 0x2B8D
STRING: 「Yes. So, Tokiwa-san..」

LABEL: 0x2BB7
STRING: 「You need to go and call for help.」

LABEL: 0x2BEC
STRING: Yukari grabbed Tokiwa's hand with both of hers.

LABEL: 0x2C80
STRING: 「Howaa!」

LABEL: 0x2CAC
STRING: 「Tell ROMLES what happened on this ship.」

LABEL: 0x2CEC
STRING: 「And get us out of here.」

LABEL: 0x2D29
STRING: She gripped her hand tightly.

LABEL: 0x2D51
STRING: Tokiwa looked back and forth between her hand and Yukari's, and eventually waved her hand.

LABEL: 0x2E0D
STRING: 「――I get it.」

LABEL: 0x2E33
STRING: 「But, let me correct you on one thing.」

LABEL: 0x2E68
STRING: She raised a finger while saying that.

LABEL: 0x2E9C
STRING: There was a hint of pride on her face.

LABEL: 0x2ED1
STRING: 「That is not my role alone.」

LABEL: 0x2F0B
STRING: 「It's my and Katagiri-san's duty. Isn't that right?」

LABEL: 0x2F56
STRING: 「Yeah, exactly.」

LABEL: 0x2F78
STRING: Tokiwa nodded in satisfaction.

LABEL: 0x2FA6
STRING: The atmosphere naturally brightened at the prospect of us finally being able to escape.

LABEL: 0x30E2
STRING: 「I understand.」

LABEL: 0x3100
STRING: 「Also, just one more thing.」

LABEL: 0x312C
STRING: 「May I ask you a favor?」

LABEL: 0x31C0
STRING: 「Wh-What is it?」

LABEL: 0x31E9
STRING: Tokiwa's words puzzled Yukari.

LABEL: 0x321D
STRING: However, despite her confusion, Tokiwa said something with a big smile.

LABEL: 0x32CF
STRING: 「――I'm incredibly hungry.」

LABEL: 0x3523
STRING: 「Well, everyone, are you ready?」

LABEL: 0x355E
STRING: After returning to the crew room, we followed Tokiwa's lead and divided the food among us.

LABEL: 0x35A8
STRING: Come to think of it, it had been a whole day since I'd had my last meal.

LABEL: 0x35FC
STRING: ...I had to put off eating later every time there was a chance, so this was one of the few times I'd had a break.

LABEL: 0x3719
STRING: 「Itadakimasu.」

LABEL: 0x37A4
STRING: 「Itadakimasu.」

LABEL: 0x37CC
STRING: 「Itadakimasu.」

LABEL: 0x37EA
STRING: All of us took out a preserved food of his/her choice from the packaging.

LABEL: 0x3820
STRING: Yukari said that she wasn't hungry, but...

LABEL: 0x38A3
STRING: sure enough, she%Nwas still staring at the seafood hamburger in front of her%Nwith a delicate expression.

LABEL: 0x38EF
STRING: Tokiwa had her usual chicken sandwich.

LABEL: 0x391D
STRING: This girl couldn't get enough of them.

LABEL: 0x394F
STRING: My choice was the squid and octopus lovey-dovey pan-fried gyoza, a mysteriously named object that made me wonder why the developers didn't question it in some way.

LABEL: 0x3AA2
STRING: 「Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x3AC1
STRING: 「What is it?」

LABEL: 0x3AEA
STRING: 「Does that taste good?」

LABEL: 0x3B17
STRING: 「Yeah. Contrary to its appearance and name, it's pretty good.」

LABEL: 0x3BBF
STRING: 「Give it to me.」

LABEL: 0x3BDE
STRING: 「Excuse me?」

LABEL: 0x3BF6
STRING: When I looked, Tokiwa was extending her hand and motioning for me to give it to her.

LABEL: 0x3C44
STRING: It was a strange gesture, but... her eyes were serious.

LABEL: 0x3C72
STRING: 「Why do I have to give you the lovey-dovey pan-fried gyoza with squid and octopus I chose?!」

LABEL: 0x3CDD
STRING: 「Because it looks delicious.」

LABEL: 0x3D08
STRING: 「You have your chicken sandwich already!」

LABEL: 0x3DA8
STRING: 「I've already had enough of it.」

LABEL: 0x3DEF
STRING: 「Then, why did you choose the chicken sandwich instead of the lovey-dovey pan-fried gyoza?!」

LABEL: 0x3E50
STRING: 「It's risk hedging. What if I pick a food I've never eaten before and it tastes terrible?」

LABEL: 0x3EB7
STRING: 「...Then, you can just grab another one. There's still some lovey-dovey pan-fried gyoza left.」

LABEL: 0x3F81
STRING: 「One moment, please.」

LABEL: 0x3FAE
STRING: Yukari interjected.

LABEL: 0x3FC8
STRING: She was nibbling on her hamburger, but... maybe it was the way she was eating it, but it didn't look as if it was tasty.

LABEL: 0x4047
STRING: 「Please don't open any extra ones.」

LABEL: 0x40D8
STRING: 「After you two leave the <SHEEP III>, these emergency rations will be the only thing left for me to eat.」

LABEL: 0x4138
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0x418C
STRING: She was right.

LABEL: 0x41AE
STRING: It wasn't a good idea to waste food now.

LABEL: 0x41EE
STRING: 「Okay then, Tokiwa, let's trade.」

LABEL: 0x4282
STRING: 「Hih you hay somefing?」

LABEL: 0x42BB
STRING: 「Come on, stop stuffing your face.」

LABEL: 0x42FE
STRING: 「Ith fine.

LABEL: 0x4373
STRING: Hese gyoza awe dewicious.」

LABEL: 0x439E
STRING: 「Hey! You!」

LABEL: 0x43BE
STRING: What the heck?

LABEL: 0x43DA
STRING: Before I knew it, the lovey-dovey pan-fried gyoza of squid and octopus had disappeared from my sight!

LABEL: 0x4436
STRING: 「Tokiwa! What have you done?!」

LABEL: 0x453B
STRING: Phew.」

LABEL: 0x45B1
STRING: 「It's all right. I enjoyed them.」

LABEL: 0x45E6
STRING: 「That's not what I meant...」

LABEL: 0x467A
STRING: 「Let me correct myself.」

LABEL: 0x46F3
STRING: 「It wasn't as good as I thought.」

LABEL: 0x472E
STRING: 「Ahh, geez!」

LABEL: 0x474E
STRING: 「Well, there's nothing I can do about it now that you've eaten it...」

LABEL: 0x478C
STRING: 「At least give me a replacement chicken sandwich.」

LABEL: 0x4832
STRING: 「Well, there's nothing I can do about something I've already eaten.」

LABEL: 0x4883
STRING: 「What... did you say...!?」

LABEL: 0x48C3
STRING: The only thing left in her hand was the wrapping paper of the now-gone chicken sandwich――

LABEL: 0x4927
STRING: I led a painful existence, like a ballast that had fallen into the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x4969
STRING: So... what was I supposed to eat then...?

LABEL: 0x4A0D
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, if you don't have anything to eat, please take this.」

LABEL: 0x4A58
STRING: 「Y-Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0x4A78
STRING: As expected, Yukari was a chief attendant who cared about her passengers.

LABEL: 0x4AB0
STRING: Her kindness was immeasurable.

LABEL: 0x4AD8
STRING: I looked up and turned to face her.

LABEL: 0x4B04
STRING: What she was offering to me... was a plastic bag filled with liquid.

LABEL: 0x4B5C
STRING: 「...Umm, this is...?」

LABEL: 0x4BEE
STRING: 「The Dividing Dry from earlier.」

LABEL: 0x4C27
STRING: 「...You want me to drink this?」

LABEL: 0x4CB9
STRING: 「I mean, it saved your life, didn't it?」

LABEL: 0x4D17
STRING: 「Shouldn't you be thankful?」

LABEL: 0x4D6E
STRING: 「...At least give me a straw.」

LABEL: 0x4E6E
STRING: And so, we ate our last meal.

LABEL: 0x4EA6
STRING: Tokiwa was cheerful from start to finish.

LABEL: 0x4F54
STRING: 「Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x4FAA
STRING: 「Yes, this is Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x4FD6
STRING: 「I don't know how to say this, but thanks.」

LABEL: 0x5089
STRING: 「Well... Your constant cheerfulness helped me out a lot.」

LABEL: 0x50D4
STRING: 「Helped, you say?」

LABEL: 0x50F8
STRING: 「――"This girl can't read the mood at all." Was that not how you thought of me?」

LABEL: 0x5153
STRING: Gulp.

LABEL: 0x5169
STRING: During the times we lost someone.

LABEL: 0x5189
STRING: During the times we lost something.

LABEL: 0x51A9
STRING: Still, even as her behavior remained unchanged, I hadn't found it unpleasant.

LABEL: 0x5201
STRING: Tokiwa looked at me as if she could see right through me, but suddenly averted her eyes.

LABEL: 0x52C1
STRING: 「When I was young, my father told me...」

LABEL: 0x52F5
STRING: 「"No matter how dark the night sky is, be like a star that illuminates your surroundings."」

LABEL: 0x539E
STRING: 「...It's more logical that way, right?」

LABEL: 0x53DD
STRING: 「Tokiwa――」

LABEL: 0x53F9
STRING: I see... She was an intelligent yet kind girl.

LABEL: 0x5433
STRING: There was no way she wouldn't be affected by other people's deaths.

LABEL: 0x547F
STRING: However, she tried her best to act as cheerful as possible.

LABEL: 0x54AB
STRING: For all of our sake――

LABEL: 0x553F
STRING: 「Therefore, even though irritation was written all over your face,

LABEL: 0x5589
STRING: the Katagiri-san who was able to read the mood couldn't help but find it amusing.」

LABEL: 0x5650
STRING: 「So, don't worry.」

LABEL: 0x5673
STRING: 「Tokiwa...」

LABEL: 0x56A9
STRING: I take back what I said.

LABEL: 0x56C1
STRING: She might be intelligent, but she wasn't kind.

LABEL: 0x56F5
STRING: She was just a deep-sea creature maniac.

LABEL: 0x5725
STRING: Tokiwa would always be Tokiwa, I thought while sighing.

LABEL: 0x5830
STRING: 「Looks like everyone's done eating.」

LABEL: 0x585D
STRING: 「Well then, let's go, shall we...」

LABEL: 0x58F5
STRING: 「――Not yet.」

LABEL: 0x5970
STRING: 「We haven't cleaned up yet.」
